name: Climb Up Tetris
description:
Introduction

"Climb Up Tetris" is the Tetris-Liked game developed during DT2020 GAME DESIGN I in NTU.

GUM wants to climb up Tetris. It needs your cooperation!

How To Play

This is a two-player game. 

  • P1: WASD
  • P2:↑↓←→

The duties of the two players may switch.

W/↑S/↓A/←D/→Tetris BrickRotateSpeed UpMove LeftMove rightGUMJumpRescue GUMMove LeftMove right

Do remember, If GUM is trapped in the bricks, you can use S or ↓ to rescue it!

Source Code

https://github.com/NYH-Dolphin/Climb-Up-Tetris-Source-Code

Contribution

Individual Project: Programmer | Level designer

Credits

  • Dialogue System: Fungus https://fungusgames.com/

  • AudioEffect: 爱给网 https://www.aigei.com/sound/
